title: Chomsky & Dershowitz Debate - Future of Israel and Palestine Part 1
description:
Kennedy School of Government, November 29, 2005

We bring you a debate between Noam Chomsky and Alan Dershowtiz on the question, "Israel and Palestine After Disengagement: Where Do We Go From Here?" Dershowitz argued for a political solution based on an Israeli withdrawal from Palestinian towns and a mobile security fence to protect Israel's borders, while Chomsky insisted that the main obstacle to peace in the region is U.S.-Israeli insistence on maintaining settlements and rejecting minimal Palestinian rights. They faced off at Harvard's Kennedy School of Government.

Download a transcript of the debate: http://bit.ly/yotZtf
